column2: bike_test <- bike_test %>% filter(as.numeric(bike_test$start_station) != as.numeric(bike_test$end_station)) %>% group_by(start_station, start_lat, start_lon, end_station, end_lat, end_lon) %>% summarize(count = n())
m <- addPolylines(m, lat = as.numeric(bike_test[i,c(2,5)]), lng = as.numeric(bike_test[i,c(3,6)]), col = "blue", weight = bike_test$count, opacity = 0.2)
